item.title: Hello Huston ... We have a problem
item.description: But what is this error? Have you ever had that moment, in front of your debugger, when you look at the error message, remember what you’ve just done that last modification and … nothing. Nothing makes sense. via GIPHY Just today I experienced such a moment. I’m currently working on a new application in .NET MAUI. I was making a generic class for managing the application’s pages. I was implementing this in a real case and the BOOM ðŸ’¥ I get this error displayed on my Visual Studio :
